dataSource.description: Used for setting the source data. The elements that are part of this array will be present the left column. Except the elements whose keys are included in targetKeys prop.

filterOption.description: A function to determine whether an item should show in search result list

footer.description: customize the progress dot by setting a scoped slot

lazy.description: property of vc-lazy-load for lazy rendering items. Turn off it by set to false.

listStyle.description: A custom CSS style used for rendering the transfer columns.

locale.description: i18n text including filter, empty text, item unit, etc
locale.defaultValue: { itemUnit: 'item', itemsUnit: 'items', notFoundContent: 'The list is empty', searchPlaceholder: 'Search here' }

operations.description: A set of operations that are sorted from top to bottom.

render.description: The function to generate the item shown on a column. Based on an record (element of the dataSource array), this function should return a element which is generated from that record. Also, it can return a plain object with value and label, label is a element and value is for title

selectedKeys.description: A set of keys of selected items.

showSearch.description: If included, a search box is shown on each column.

targetKeys.description: A set of keys of elements that are listed on the right column.

titles.description: A set of titles that are sorted from left to right.
